Pre-Game Insights: Denmark and Switzerland begin preparations for the upcoming Euro 2024 when they lock horns in a friendly at Parken Stadium on Saturday.
Denmark have been drawn in Group C of the upcoming European Championship alongside Serbia, Slovenia and 2020 beaten finalists England.
Switzerland will take on Hungary, Scotland and Germany in Group A of the Euros later in June.
Denmark head into the weekend as the more in-form side and are predicted to win the match.
